attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thinks that the title of 'Right Honourable' should be withdrawn from Members of Parliament as the recent revelations on their expense claims shows they are not so.
 

What some of them have been doing is tantamount to fraud and us lesser mortals would be charged with such!
 
I am aware that 'guidelines' are just that, guidelines, but they have been broken and manipulated to service the greed of individual MP's.
 
I have had to work for years within guidelines for 'Transfusion practice' that if  they were comprimised would lead to thousands of people dying as a result of a bad transfusions so GUIDELINES are enforceable.
 
I single out no individual MP nor am I partisan to any particular political party but the public must be able to seek redress and at fault MP's should be charged with attempts to defraud.
 
Angela Timms
41 Gurney Road
Shirley
Southampton
SO15 5GF

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
